name: Islands in the Sky
description:
Explore a series of mysterious islands in the sky above Worcestershire.  All artwork for the rooms was contributed by children from in and around Worcestershire.  The project was funded by Severn Arts and Worcestershire County Council.

For more info visit -

https://www.severnarts.org.uk/islands-in-the-sky

MOVEMENT:

Keyboard players use arrow keys to move the rat around the islands.

Touch players use on screen controls to move the rat around the islands.

GRAPHICS MODES :

The game has two graphics modes, FX on and FX off.  If running on older hardware it is advisable to play with FX off as this will allow the game to run more smoothly.  

Keyboard players toggle between FX modes at any time by pressing T.

Touch players select FX on or off using the icon on the startup screen.

3D MODE:

The game has an anaglyph 3D mode.  This requires red & blue 3D glasses in order to function.

Keyboard players toggle 3D mode at any time by pressing Y.

Touch players select 3D mode on or off at the startup screen.
